Personalized Solutions for Every Healthcare Role

Select your role to see how MagnusOS can transform your healthcare operations with AI-powered solutions tailored to your specific needs

Why Choose MagnusOS?

Discover the universal strengths that make MagnusOS the preferred choice for modern healthcare organizations

Unified Platform, Modular Approach

MagnusOS is a single platform with modules for HIS, CRM, ERP, Radiology, etc., all sharing one secure data backbone. Supported by ABHA Health ID integration for interoperability.

  • Integrated data flow
  • No duplicate entry
  • Comprehensive analytics
  • ABHA Health ID integration

AI-First Innovations

MagnusOS embeds AI at every step - from auto-prioritizing ER patients based on severity to AI analyzing imaging scans for quicker diagnostics. Unlike add-on AI tools, it's baked into the workflow, amplifying your team rather than replacing them.

  • Smart Triage & Scheduling
  • Radiology Pre-reads
  • Predictive Inventory
  • Personalized Care Insights

Hybrid Cloud + Offline Resilience

MagnusOS can be deployed on-cloud, on-premise, or hybrid - meaning even if the internet goes down, your hospital can keep running offline, with data syncing seamlessly when reconnected. Sensitive data stays on-site for compliance, while cloud services enable secure data backup and AI processing in the background.

  • Offline operation
  • Data sync when online
  • Sensitive data on-site
  • Cloud AI processing

Security & Compliance at Core

Our platform was built with strict healthcare regulations in mind - ensuring PHI is encrypted end-to-end and access is fully auditable. Compliance with HIPAA, GDPR and India's ABHA/NDHM is not an afterthought but a foundational design principle.

  • HIPAA compliant
  • GDPR compliant
  • NDHM/ABHA ready
  • Blockchain consent logs

Built for the Future of Healthcare

MagnusOS combines cutting-edge technology with deep healthcare expertise to deliver a platform that grows with your organization and adapts to emerging healthcare challenges.
